law.history: Repealed 1982Ky. Acts ch. 113,sec. 14, effective July 15, 1982. -- Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 290, sec. 4, effective June 17, 1978. -- Amended 1976 Ky. Acts ch. 332, sec. 32. -- Created 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 406, sec. 41, effective January 1, 1975.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Mental disease or defect -- Proceedings -- Examination.
